roleset.name: tram
roleset.note: TRAM-V NOTES: Member of VNcls vehicle-51.4.1. Checked by Julia, 11/2010. (from tram.01-v)

example.name: from Google
example.text: We trammed to the Gulhane tram stop, then walked northwest towards Topkapi.

example.name: with agent
example.text: They trammed in big trays of crisp, fried chicken and wrestled with whole cargoes of potato salad, baked salmon, homemade cake and ice cream so long as the appetites of the old folks lasted.
example.arg: big trays of crisp, fried chicken
so long as the appetites of the old folks lasted
